updated_cases.title:
Verify that,Client notification response to client in json format only if its meet criteria 
 1.Feature Flag should enabled 
 2.If the client longpoll contains X-NS-CLIENT-NOTIFICATION as one of its request header
 3. Template is migrated
updated_cases.custom_summary:
Verify that,Client notification response to client in json format only if its meet criteria 
 1.Feature Flag should enabled 
 2.If the client longpoll contains X-NS-CLIENT-NOTIFICATION as one of its request header
 3. Template is migrated
updated_cases.custom_preconds: Stack should be up and running
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Install proper client version
2. Configure the needed policy
3. Send the required traffic and check for expected results
updated_cases.custom_expected: We Should get NS based pop-up and all the fields should be rendered properly

updated_cases.title: Verify the json fields which is sent by the proxy to NSClient
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify the json fields which is sent by the proxy to NSClient
updated_cases.custom_preconds: Stack should be up and running
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Install proper client version
2. Configure the needed policy
3. Send the required traffic and check for expected results
updated_cases.custom_expected:
{
 "version":<version to identify between old and new message format, v2 for R55>
 "app":<"Microsoft Office 365 OneDrive for Business">,
 "app_access_type":<"native"|"Chrome"| ...>,
 "suppress":<0|1>,
 "supress_interval":<in secs>,
 "key":<filename | url in case of web>,
 "activity":<"upload"|"download" | "browse">,
 "category":"<web category type in case of web>" // not used in client
 "link":<"User justification page URL">,
 "cancel":<Cancel url>,
 "access_method":"Client",
 "activity":"Upload",
 "block_type":<block | user alert>,
 "expire":<expire time of pop up in sec>
 "information":"Sorry, You are not allowed to perform operation of Credit Report.pdf upload using Microsoft Office 365 OneDrive for Business"
 "title":<custom title>,
 "subtitle":<subtitle text>,
 "footer_message":<footer text>,
 "justification_options":<"true" | "false">,
 "stopaction": <string>, // Button text to acknowledge block or stop user action, default "OK" (block), default "Stop" (user alert)
 "proceed":<string>, // (Optional) Button text to acknowledge proceed and send justification, default "Proceed"
 "logo": <base 64 encoded logo>,
 "logo_size":<small | large>
 "stripe_color":<RGB value>,
 "descriptionBox":<default text in notification box>
 "mod_session_id":"720653742283762432",
 "url":<link to post notification response>
 }

updated_cases.title: Verify that proxy sends the html based response if it does not receive X-NS-CLIENT-NOTIFICATION header
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify that proxy sends the html based response if it does not receive X-NS-CLIENT-NOTIFICATION header
updated_cases.custom_preconds: Stack should be up and running
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Install proper client version
2. Configure the needed policy
3. Send the required traffic and check for expected results
updated_cases.custom_expected: Proxy will send the html based response to Client
